name: Add new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new UpViralÂ contacts
description:
This template periodically checks for new contacts in UpViral Campaign and uses the retrieved information to create new rows in Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1G6UWHv4pMrMayUVSEpX8JKUv2iOY0w-eSysuwM3vkTY/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
